subject: NEXT OF KIN
body:
Dear Michael,

I know this way of communication is not the most secure channel to pass a
message of this importance but right now, it is the quickest means
available to me, please bear with me.

My name is Mr Leonard William Esq, an Attorney at Law. This involves a
foreign client of mine, who hereafter shall be referred to as my client,
who died as a result of a heart-related condition in November, 2012.

I have contacted you to assist in transferring the money left behind by my
client before it is confiscated or declared UN-serviceable by the Bank
where  this deposit valued at 6.7million dollars is lodged.This Bank has
issued me  a notice to contact the next of kin, or the account will be
confiscated.

My proposition to you is to seek your consent to present you as the next-
of-kin and beneficiary of my late client, so that the proceeds of this
account can be paid to you. Then we can share  the amount on a mutually
agreed-upon percentage. All legal documents to back up your claim as my
client's next-of-kin will be provided. All I require is your honest
cooperation to enable us to see this transaction through.

Please contact me at once to indicate your interest. Do understand that
this transaction does require utmost confidence and you should keep this
mail to yourself notwithstanding if you are rejecting the transaction or
accepting it.

Note that I reserve the right to reject your acceptance of this proposal if
I have reasons to believe that you may not be honest or discrete as it
concerns this proposal.

Further details will be given as soon as your interest is indicated.
Best Regards,
Mr Leonard William (Esq)
